member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_LEVEL
member.summary: Contains information about system battery drain policy settings. This structure is part of the structure.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_LEVEL.Enable
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the alarm should be activated when the battery discharges below the value set in BatteryLevel.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_LEVEL.BatteryLevel
member.summary: The battery capacity for this battery discharge policy, expressed as a percentage.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_LEVEL.PowerPolicy
member.summary: A structure that defines the action to take for this battery discharge policy.

member.name: SYSTEM_POWER_LEVEL.MinSystemState
member.summary: The minimum system sleep state to enter when the battery discharges below the value set in BatteryLevel. This member must be one of the enumeration type values.
